Crl.M.C.No.9101 of 2016 Dated this the 27" day of December, 2016 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.2734 of 2016 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court -II, Nedumangad. The major offence alleged is under Section 380 of IPC. She was granted bail as per order in C.M.P.No.16099 of 2016 of the said court. While granting bail, the petitioner was directed to execute a bond for 250,000/- along with two solvent sureties. It is directed that at least one among the sureties shall be a close blood relative of the accused, for which she shall produce proof. The grievance is against the said imposition of condition. After hearing the learned Public Prosecutor and also considering the submission, the second condition imposed by the learned Magistrate is modified as follows: One among the sureties shall be a close blood relative of the accused and if one of the sureties is a close blood relative, she need not be a person having properties. If such a surety is Bea apa 2016/KER/55581 Crl.M.C.No.9101/2016 2 not available, the petitioner is at liberty to produce solvent sureties and the solvency can be verified by the court below by appropriate directions.
